backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Lead and Service management with full CRUD operations, including reordering services by sort order. Includes blob storage mixin and typed data structures for packages, addons, and service categories.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (dark theme, auth bypass, sidebar navigation, lead management CRM, etc.) to their corresponding source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON record summarizing the AutomationWorkflowsPage.tsx file, noting its 5 workflow cards with status indicators and a TypeScript fix for the result state type.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file configuring Tailwind base/components/utilities and defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, card, sidebar, chart colors, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the Quick Bee AI Growth Engine app, mounting the React app at the #root div and loading main.tsx as a module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router configuration with all application routes (dashboard, leads, services, AI tools, automation, analytics, checkout, etc.) wrapped in a CartProvider and Layout component.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar component with navigation links to all major app sections, Quick Bee logo/branding, active route highlighting, and a cart item badge on the Checkout link.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper that renders the AppSidebar alongside a scrollable main content area with an Outlet for child routes and a branded footer.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: React context providing cart state (items, totals) with add, remove, update quantity, and clear operations, persisted to localStorage under a fixed key.
frontend/src/data/masterPlans.ts: Defines the MasterPlan interface and exports three pricing tiers (Spark, Surge, Titan) with INR prices, features, and display metadata.
frontend/src/data/seedServices.ts: Defines the SeedService interface and exports an array of seed service entries (Web Dev, etc.) with tiered packages, addons, and maintenance plans for initial data population.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for CRUD operations on Leads and Services (and likely other entities) by calling the ICP backend actor methods with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind with CSS custom properties for a dark teal-themed design system, and defines reusable component classes like glass-card, teal-gradient, and status badges.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
A React page that lets users input a keyword and generate AI-powered content (SEO blog post, social captions, LinkedIn post, Instagram carousel) using a configured AI endpoint, with copy and export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AISmartSystemsPage.ts: A React page providing multiple AI-powered sales tools (service recommender, proposal generator, pricing strategy, closing scripts, follow-up messages) that accept user inputs and generate AI responses via configured endpoint.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsEnginePage.t: A React page that accepts a date range, optionally POSTs to an automation webhook, and displays mock GA4-style analytics KPIs and charts using Recharts.
frontend/src/pages/AutomationDashboardPa: A React page displaying toggleable automation switches (WhatsApp auto-reply, proposal send, lead follow-up, etc.) that persist their on/off state via automationConfig utilities.
frontend/src/pages/AutomationWorkflowsPa: A React page listing predefined automation workflows (new lead, meeting, payment, analytics, content) that can be manually triggered via POST requests to a configured webhook URL, with per-workflow status tracking.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart checkout page with item quantity controls, removal, and Razorpay payment integration, navigating to success or failure pages based on payment outcome.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying a hero section, lead/service stats, quick-action navigation links, automation status, and recent webhook logs.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: CRM leads management page supporting list/grid views, CRUD operations via dialogs, status filtering, and CSV export for leads.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Simple payment failure screen with an error icon, message, and buttons to retry checkout or return to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Payment success confirmation page that clears the cart, triggers a payment automation event, and displays a generated invoice reference number.
frontend/src/pages/SalesConfigPage.tsx: Settings page for managing API credentials and webhook URLs (Razorpay, WhatsApp, email, CRM, etc.) with enable/disable toggles, connection status badges, and webhook test functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceManagementPage: Admin page for creating, editing, duplicating, reordering, and deleting services with tiered pricing packages and add-ons via modal dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesCatalogPage.t: Displays a filterable catalog of services with category tabs, and includes a modal for previewing service packages, add-ons, and quantity selection before adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/WebhookLogsPage.tsx: Renders a paginated table of webhook log entries with filtering by tool name and status, plus refresh and clear actions.
frontend/src/utils/aiClient.ts: Provides a `callAI` function that sends chat messages to a configured OpenAI-compatible API endpoint and logs the webhook call result.
frontend/src/utils/automationConfig.ts: Defines the `AutomationConfig` interface and provides get/save helpers that persist automation toggle states to localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/automationTrigger.ts: Fires a POST request to the configured automation webhook URL when a specific automation is enabled, and logs the outcome.
frontend/src/utils/mockAnalyticsData.ts: Generates randomized mock analytics data (sessions, users, revenue, traffic sources, top pages) for a given date range.
frontend/src/utils/razorpayCheckout.ts: Dynamically loads the Razorpay SDK and opens a payment checkout modal using the configured Razorpay key, invoking success or failure callbacks.
frontend/src/utils/salesConfig.ts: Defines the `SalesConfig` interface with API keys, webhook URLs, and per-field enable toggles, with get/save helpers backed by localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/webhookLogger.ts: Persists webhook call log entries (up to 500) in localStorage and exposes functions to retrieve and clear them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, teal/dark color palette, border radii, shadows, and background gradients, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for the Quick Bee AI Growth Engine platform, including architecture notes, theme details, stack (Motoko/React/TypeScript/TanStack Router/Tailwind), existing features, and image requirements.
